::Spears:;

She walked back towards the ark.  She wondered if there would ever be 
an end to the war.  At the same time, she smiled and looked at 
Striker.  She felt that no matter what, as long as they were 
together, things could still work out alright. She held his arm 
tightly in her's and smiled.
